name: Skooper's Skurryplace
description:
Who be!
This be Skooper! Hullo!

Skooper maked a big specel gaame! 4 u!
To gets all skurried up for Halolwen!
But! Skooper got tred & ddnt fin in tiem 4 Halolwen...
:(

So Skooper releese on New Year insted!
Not much diferant from Halolwen!
:D

Pres Arows to moov!
Pres Entre to Invustigat!
Pres Spaace to Puse!
Lok at Boxies and finded the Key to climm Lader!
BEWAR OF BOOJUMPS!!!!!
(No actul boojumps, it just goste)

Say iff their b buggy stuf!
Giv al teh gud fedbaks plz or Ill b saaaad!!
>:'(

BYYYYYYYYYYYE!
